english: He is suspected as an accomplice of the murder ..
chinese: 他涉嫌为这次凶杀案的同谋。

english: He was indicted as being accessory man to the crime .
chinese: 他被指控为该罪的同谋者。

english: She would be unable to ask her confederate indoors .
chinese: 她不能请她的同谋者到屋里去。

english: The world was gathered in conspiracy against him .
chinese: 全世界的人都在同谋合伙来跟他捣乱。

english: The french conspirators were forced to escape very hurriedly .
chinese: 法国同谋者被迫匆促逃亡。
同谋造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: I'll be in no sense accomplice or help in this cruel business .
chinese: 我决不愿在这惨无人道的买卖里作同谋或帮凶。

english: The police discovered his conspiracy to overthrow the government with some army officers .
chinese: 警方发现他与一些军官同谋企图推翻政府。

english: There had been no open complicity between mother and daughter, no open understanding .
chinese: 母女之间并没有公开同谋，也没有坦率的协议。

english: Her accomplice suffered for his share in the escape, not-withstanding his timid contrivances .
chinese: 她的同谋者，尽管想出了他那怯懦的策略，为了这件逃脱的事还是吃了苦头。

english: The windows smiled, the door coaxed and beckoned, the creeper blushed confederacy .
chinese: 窗户都微微含笑，门户都甘言引诱，举手招呼，长春藤也都因为暗中同谋，满面现出赧颜。

english: It becomes a part of the "monolithic and ruthless conspiracy" to take over the world, as john f.kennedy put it .
chinese: 正如肯尼迪所说，它就变成了企图霸占全世界的“整体的野蛮阴谋”的一个同谋。

english: And then i explained to her how we were friends cinctured by years of embarrassment and travel and complicity .
chinese: 接着，我向她解释，我们是老朋友，多年的甘苦与共，浪迹江湖和同谋关系，已经使我们的友谊牢不可破。

english: As such , they were complicit in those murders
chinese: 因此，他们也是这些谋杀案的同谋，

english: That conspirator was accused of conspiracy to murder
chinese: 那个同谋者被控参与谋杀。

english: The prosecutor here talks of criminal conspiracy - -
chinese: 今天的检举针对的是罪犯同谋
